item.title: Complete Guide: Unsteam - Playing Coop with Cracked Games
item.author: axekinn@proton.me (Axekin)
item.description:
Complete Guide: Unsteam - Playing Coop with Cracked Games

Author: Axekin(axekinn@proton.me)

üéÆ Introduction to Unsteam

Unsteam is a Steam emulator that allows cracked games to work with online multiplayer features. It simulates the Steam API to enable cooperation between players with unofficial versions.

‚ö†Ô∏è Legal Warning: This tutorial is for educational purposes only. Make sure to comply with your country’s laws regarding copyright. Ideally, you should own a legal copy of the game.

üìã Prerequisites

Minimum Configuration

  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Steam: Steam client installed and connected
  • Game: Compatible cracked version
  • Network: Stable Internet connection

Required Tools

  • Base64 decoder (for links)
  • Web browser
  • Archive manager (7-Zip, WinRAR)

üîß Step 1: Obtaining Files

Game Downloads 

# Base64 encoded link - Decode it
aHR0cHM6Ly9jcy5yaW4ucnUvZm9ydW0vdmlld2ZvcnVtLnBocD9mPTIy
  1. Decode the Base64 link above
  2. Access the cs.rin.ru forum
  3. Download your desired game

Unsteam Download 

# Base64 encoded link - Decode it
aHR0cHM6Ly9jcy5yaW4ucnUvZm9ydW0vdmlld3RvcGljLnBocD9mPTIwJnQ9MTM0NzA3
  1. Decode the Base64 link above
  2. Download the latest Unsteam version
  3. Extract the archive to a temporary folder

üîç Step 2: Game Information Research

Using SteamDB 

# Reference site
https://steamdb.info/
  1. Access SteamDB.info
  2. Search for your game by name
  3. Note the following information:
    • Main game AppID
    • DLC AppID (if present)
    • DLC Names

Example for God of War 

Game Name: God of War
Main AppID: 1593500
DLC Example: Digital Deluxe Edition (AppID: 1593501)

‚öôÔ∏è Step 3: Unsteam Configuration

Unsteam File Structure 

Unsteam/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam_loader_x64.exe    # Main launcher
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam_x64.dll          # Emulation library
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam.ini              # Configuration file

Configuring the unsteam.ini file

Create or modify the unsteam.ini file:

[loader]
exe_file=
dll_file=unsteam_x64.dll

[game]
real_app_id=387990
fake_app_id=480
language=english
beta_name=public
saves_path=saves

[dlcs]
appid1=DLC Name
appid2=DLC Name

Detailed Parameter Explanation

[loader] Section 

exe_file=GoW.exe                # Path to your game EXE
dll_file=unsteam_x64.dll       # Unsteam DLL (do not modify)

[game] Section 

real_app_id=1593500            # Real game AppID (from SteamDB)
fake_app_id=480                # Fake AppID (leave 480 as default)
language=english               # Game language (english/french/german/etc.)
beta_name=public               # Beta version (leave "public")
saves_path=saves               # Save folder

[dlcs] Section 

1593501=Digital Deluxe Edition # AppID=DLC Name
1593502=Season Pass            # AppID=DLC Name (example)

üìÅ Step 4: Installation and Configuration

File Placement 

YourGame/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ GoW.exe                    # Game executable
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam_loader_x64.exe     # ‚Üê Copy this file here
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam_x64.dll           # ‚Üê Copy this file here
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam.ini               # ‚Üê Create this file here
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ saves/                    # Save folder (auto-created)

Example Configuration for God of War 

[loader]
exe_file=GoW.exe
dll_file=unsteam_x64.dll

[game]
real_app_id=1593500
fake_app_id=480
language=english
beta_name=public
saves_path=saves

[dlcs]
1593501=Digital Deluxe Upgrade

üöÄ Step 5: Game Launch

Launch Procedure

  1. Launch Steam first
  2. Log in to your Steam account
  3. Navigate to your game folder
  4. Execute unsteam_loader_x64.exe (NOT the game .exe)
  5. Wait for loading

Functionality Verification 

‚úÖ Steam overlay visible
‚úÖ Steam profile displayed in game
‚úÖ Multiplayer functions active
‚úÖ Steam achievements unlocked (optional)

üåê Step 6: Cooperative Gaming

Network Configuration 

Mode 1: LAN via Hamachi/Radmin
Mode 2: Direct Steam connection
Mode 3: Community servers

Connecting with Friends

  1. Ensure your friends also use Unsteam
  2. Verify you have the same AppID configured
  3. Launch the game simultaneously
  4. Use normal multiplayer functions

üîß Common Troubleshooting

Frequent Issues

Game won’t launch 

‚ùå Problem: "Failed to load game"
‚úÖ Solution: Check the exe_file= path in unsteam.ini

Missing Steam overlay 

‚ùå Problem: No Steam overlay
‚úÖ Solution: Launch Steam BEFORE unsteam_loader_x64.exe

Non-functional multiplayer 

‚ùå Problem: Cannot join friends
‚úÖ Solution: Verify everyone uses the same real_app_id

DLL Error 

‚ùå Problem: "unsteam_x64.dll not found"
‚úÖ Solution: Place DLL in the same folder as the EXE

Logs and Debugging 

Generated log files:
- unsteam.log (in game folder)
- Steam logs (in Steam/logs/)

‚ö†Ô∏è Important Precautions

Steam Account Security

  • DO NOT use your main Steam account
  • Create a secondary account if necessary
  • Avoid games with aggressive anti-cheat

Game Compatibility 

‚úÖ Compatible: Steam coop/multiplayer games
‚úÖ Compatible: Games with Steam Workshop
‚ùå Incompatible: Games with EAC/BattlEye
‚ùå Incompatible: Games requiring Steam DRM

Updates 

Frequency: Check Unsteam updates monthly
Source: cs.rin.ru (official forum)
Version: Always use the latest stable version

üéØ Advanced Tips

Performance Optimization 

[advanced]
enable_overlay=1               # Enable Steam overlay
enable_achievements=0          # Disable achievements (optional)
enable_stats=1                 # Enable statistics
network_timeout=5000           # Network timeout in ms

Multi-Game Configuration 

Create a folder per game with its own configuration:
Games/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ GoW/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam.ini (GoW config)
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam_loader_x64.exe
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Elden Ring/
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam.ini (Elden Ring config)
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam_loader_x64.exe

Configuration Backup 

# Backup your configurations
backup/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ unsteam_configs/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ gow_unsteam.ini
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ eldenring_unsteam.ini
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ readme.txt

üìö Additional Resources

Useful Sites

  • SteamDB: https://steamdb.info/ (game information)
  • cs.rin.ru: Main community forum
  • Steam Calculator: AppID calculator

Community

  • Gaming community Discord servers
  • Specialized Reddit forums
  • Updated community guides

üí° Final Tip: Always test with free games or games you legally own before using with other titles. Cooperation works best with stable connections and identical configurations between players.

Published on 2025-06-04 at Wiki of Axekin, last modified on 2025-06-04

item.title: Complete Guide: SteamAutoCrack - Auto-crack Steam Games
item.author: axekinn@proton.me (Axekin)
item.description:
Complete Guide: SteamAutoCrack - Auto-crack Steam Games

Author: Axekin(axekinn@proton.me)

üéÆ Introduction to SteamAutoCrack

SteamAutoCrack is an automated tool that simplifies the process of cracking Steam games. It streamlines the entire procedure by automatically applying the necessary modifications to make games work without Steam authentication.

‚ö†Ô∏è Legal Warning: This tutorial is for educational purposes only. Make sure to comply with your country’s laws regarding copyright. Ideally, you should own a legal copy of the game.

üìã Prerequisites

System Requirements

  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Steam: Clean Steam installation (optional)
  • Internet: Stable connection for downloads
  • Storage: Sufficient space for games

Required Tools

  • Base64 decoder (for encoded links)
  • Archive manager (7-Zip, WinRAR)
  • Text editor (Notepad++)

üîß Step 1: Obtaining Required Files

Game Downloads 

# Base64 encoded link - Decode it first
aHR0cHM6Ly9jcy5yaW4ucnUvZm9ydW0vdmlld2ZvcnVtLnBocD9mPTIy
  1. Decode the Base64 link above
  2. Create an account on cs.rin.ru forum
  3. Browse and download your desired games
  4. Note: You may need forum access or contact for direct links

SteamAutoCrack Download 

# Base64 encoded link - Decode it first
aHR0cHM6Ly9jcy5yaW4ucnUvZm9ydW0vdmlld3RvcGljLnBocD9mPTI5JnQ9MTEwNjA1
  1. Decode the Base64 link above
  2. Download the latest SteamAutoCrack version
  3. Extract to a dedicated folder

üìÅ Step 2: File Preparation

Game Extraction

Most downloaded games come with password protection:

# Default password (Base64 encoded)
Password: Y3MucmluLnJ1
  1. Decode the password: Y3MucmluLnJ1 ‚Üí cs.rin.ru
  2. Extract your game archive using this password
  3. Locate the main game folder

Folder Structure

After extraction, your game should look like:

YourGame/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ steamapps/
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ common/
‚îÇ       ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ GameName/          # Main game directory
‚îÇ           ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ GameName.exe   # Game executable
‚îÇ           ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ steam_api.dll  # Steam API library
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ other files...

‚öôÔ∏è Step 3: Steam API Key Generation

Getting Your Steam API Key 

# Steam Web API Key Registration
https://steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey
  1. Visit the Steam Web API page
  2. Log in with your Steam account
  3. Register for a new API key
  4. Domain Name: Enter any domain (e.g., localhost)
  5. Copy the generated API key

API Key Example 

Your API Key: 1234567890ABCDEF1234567890ABCDEF12345678

üöÄ Step 4: Using SteamAutoCrack

SteamAutoCrack Interface

When you launch SteamAutoCrack, you’ll see these main fields:

1. Game Directory Path 

Field: "Game Path"
Purpose: Location of your clean Steam game
Example: C:\Games\YourGame\steamapps\common\GameName

How to fill:

  • Navigate to your extracted game
  • Select the path: steamapps/common/GameName/
  • This should contain the main game executable

2. Steam API Key 

Field: "Steam API Key"
Purpose: Your Steam Web API key for authentication
Example: 1234567890ABCDEF1234567890ABCDEF12345678

How to fill:

  • Paste the API key you generated from Steam
  • This enables the tool to fetch game information

3. Account Name 

Field: "Account Name"
Purpose: Display name for the cracked game
Default: Usually auto-filled
Example: YourUsername

How to fill:

  • Change to your preferred name (optional)
  • This name will appear in-game if applicable

Step-by-Step Process

Configuration Example 

Game Path: C:\Games\GodOfWar\steamapps\common\GodOfWar
API Key: 1234567890ABCDEF1234567890ABCDEF12345678
Account Name: MyGamerTag

Execution

  1. Fill all three fields correctly
  2. Verify the game path contains the executable
  3. Double-check your API key is valid
  4. Click “Start” to begin the cracking process
  5. Wait for the process to complete

‚úÖ Step 5: Verification and Testing

Successful Crack Indicators 

‚úÖ Process completed without errors
‚úÖ Steam emulation files created
‚úÖ Game launches without Steam
‚úÖ Save files work properly

Testing Your Cracked Game

  1. Close Steam completely
  2. Navigate to the game folder
  3. Launch the main game executable
  4. Verify the game runs without Steam

Common Success Signs

  • Game launches normally
  • No Steam authentication required
  • Save/load functions work
  • Game runs offline

üîß Troubleshooting

Common Issues

Invalid Game Path 

‚ùå Error: "Game directory not found"
‚úÖ Solution: Ensure path points to steamapps/common/GameName/

API Key Problems 

‚ùå Error: "Invalid API key"
‚úÖ Solution: Regenerate API key from Steam Web API page

Permission Errors 

‚ùå Error: "Access denied"
‚úÖ Solution: Run SteamAutoCrack as Administrator

Antivirus Interference 

‚ùå Error: Files deleted or quarantined
‚úÖ Solution: Add exception for SteamAutoCrack folder

Debug Steps

  1. Check Windows Event Viewer for errors
  2. Verify all files are present after cracking
  3. Test with antivirus temporarily disabled
  4. Ensure sufficient disk space available

üéØ Best Practices

Game Selection 

‚úÖ Recommended: Single-player games
‚úÖ Recommended: Older Steam games
‚ùå Avoid: Online-only games
‚ùå Avoid: Games with aggressive DRM

Security Considerations

  • Use a secondary Steam account for API key
  • Keep original game files as backup
  • Scan all downloads with antivirus
  • Test in isolated environment first

Organization Tips 

Folder Structure:
Games/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Original/           # Clean game files
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Cracked/           # Post-crack games
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Tools/             # SteamAutoCrack & utilities
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Backups/           # Backup copies

üìö Additional Information

When to Use SteamAutoCrack

  • Solo gaming without Steam dependency
  • Offline gaming scenarios
  • Learning about game protection mechanisms
  • Backup purposes for owned games

Limitations

  • Online features may not work
  • Steam Workshop integration lost
  • Achievements might not sync
  • Updates require manual management

Alternatives

  • Manual cracking with specific tools
  • Other automated crackers
  • Steam emulators like Unsteam
  • Legitimate purchases during sales

üîí Legal and Ethical Considerations

Important Reminders

  • Only use with games you legally own
  • Respect intellectual property rights
  • Follow local copyright laws
  • Support game developers when possible

Recommended Approach

  1. Purchase games you enjoy
  2. Use cracking for backup/offline purposes
  3. Support developers through legitimate purchases
  4. Share knowledge responsibly

üí° Pro Tip: SteamAutoCrack is particularly useful for single-player games where you want offline access. Always maintain legal copies and use this knowledge responsibly for educational purposes.

Published on 2025-06-04 at Wiki of Axekin, last modified on 2025-06-04
